alert.note: Alert for Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 4:08PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Wayne County through 445 PM EDT... At 408 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Gardi, moving west at 5 mph. HAZARD...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Gardi. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
